creator: cpaussa@yahoo.com
text:
[INFO]: FOP 0.20.3rc
[INFO]: building formatting object tree
[ERROR]: null

Here is the simple test case. All it contains is a marker tag

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<fo:root xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format">

<fo:layout-master-set>
<fo:simple-page-master
master-name="simple"
margin-top="1in"
margin-right="1in"
margin-left="1in"
margin-bottom="1in">
<fo:region-body/>
</fo:simple-page-master>
</fo:layout-master-set>
<fo:page-sequence master-reference="simple">
<fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body">
<fo:block><fo:marker marker-class-name="abcd">One</fo:marker>
this is a test this is a test this is a test this is a test this is a test this
is a test this is a test this is a test
</fo:block>
</fo:flow></fo:page-sequence></fo:root>
